argSrc: Dog dirt on the pavement requires my complete, ground-focused attention on my way to work.
argTrg: This results in a lack of alertness in the road traffic comparable to a minor offense of the traffic regulations.

argSrc: Dog dirt on the pavement requires my complete, ground-focused attention on my way to work.
argTrg: That's why causing such obstacles must to be more urgently punished.
